verses.name: John 12:26
verses.text: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.

verses.name: John 12:27
verses.text: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour: but for this cause came I unto this hour.

verses.name: John 12:28
verses.text: Father, glorify thy name. Then came there a voice from heaven, saying, I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.

verses.name: John 12:29
verses.text: The people therefore, that stood by, and heard it, said that it thundered: others said, An angel spake to him.
